attributes.action: ensure that come the succession, should there be one, the next monarch will take up a title appropriate to the whole of the UK and Commonwealth.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The present monarch chose a wholly inappropriate title on her succession to the throne, she is the first Elizabeth of the UK and Commonwealth and yet she chose the title Elizabeth the second. Can the next monarch please choose a title that is appropriate to the position to be held.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
